name: Marble Adventure
description:
Directions:

using arrows to move

----

This is the week 3 assignment for Unity Spring '22. The theme is to make an adventure maze for a green marble. 

Player will be the role of the marble and use arrows to move around. During the process, the player needs to jump (space) over obstacles and avoid hitting into the enemies (red monsters). If the player falls off the ground or hits the enemies, the marble will be re-spawned to the current level. 

There are three levels in total, ordered by difficulty. The access to next level is usually at the end of the path where colored particles appear. Players need to touch the portal to get to the next level.
